$$ y_i = \frac{K}{1 + \left(\frac{K - y_{i-1}}{y_{i-1}}\right)*e^{-r}} $$

```{r popgrowth}

K=1000
T=100
N=2
x=1:T
y=rep(0,T)
y[1]=N
r=.2
for(i in x[2:T])
    y[i]=K/(1 + (( K - y[i-1])/y[i-1])*exp(-r))
```

```{r visupopgrowth,fig.cap="Exponential growth"}
plot(x,y,ylab="time",ylab="popsize",main="add a main")
```
